forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 59F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 44F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 17C. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 63F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 39F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High near 15C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High near 60F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 12C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 45F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 11C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 52F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 4C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 41F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High around 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. High around 50F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. High near 50F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 9C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 49F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 9C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 49F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low near 40F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High around 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 40F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
